content.rendered:
High Reliability Backed by Ophthalmologists and Certified Orthoptists Worldwide Supports the Accurate Diagnosis

  • Precision processing of 0.05 mm diameter filaments achieves one of the finest sharp streaks of light in the industry
  • Support accurate diagnosis of astigmatic axis
  • Continuous 360-degree-rotation of luminous flux
  • Bright and wide field of view realized by adopting an anti-reflection filter
  • Slimline handle with two AA batteries

excerpt.rendered: High Reliability Backed by Ophthalmologists and Certified Orthoptists Worldwide Supports the Accurate Diagnosis
